author: Christine Edwards
text:
The Charlotte Mecklenburg Utility Department is researching successful environmental education throughout the United States; specifically on Water Education targeted to k-12 students. 
Has your city developed a new or innovative environmental education program that you would be willing to share information or email materials? If not, do you know of any communities that have new, innovative, or successful environmental education programs?
I would appreciate any information that you would have to share. The Utilty currently has contacts in the school system but is looking to develop a long term water education program to increase contact with the students of our community and to foster environmental stewardship with our natural resources. 
Thank you very much for your assistance and please feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns
Christine Edwards
Community Outreach Specialist 
Charlotte Mecklenburg Utility Department 
4222 Westmont Drive
Charlotte NC 28207
O:704-336-3588
C: 704-502-7292
title: Successful Environmental Education Programs
